problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, E is the midpoint of DC, the area of ​​△DEF is N_0, then the area of ​​△ABF is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB∥CD,AB=CD,∴△DEF∽△BAF,∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupDEF}}{S_{\bigtriangleupBAF}}={(\frac{DE}{AB})}²,∵E为DC的中点,∴DE=\frac{1}{2}CD,∴DE:AB=1:2,∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupDEF}}{S_{\bigtriangleupBAF}}={(\frac{1}{2})}²,∵△DEF的面积为2,∴△ABF的面积为8．故选:D．
